LanguageData.EggPtarmiganUnfertilized.label: 뇌조 알 (무정란.)
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized 뇌조 알. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganFertilized.label: 뇌조 알 (유정란.)
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganFertilized.description: Fertilized 뇌조 알. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.Ptarmigan.label: 뇌조
LanguageData.Ptarmigan.description: A small gamebird notable for its feathered feet, to better survive in frigid temperatures.
